1.0.7.name: wordpress/jomniaga-ad-manager
1.0.7.description: The JomNiaga plugin for WordPress allows Malaysian bloggers to automatically add related ads from the JomNiaga affiliate network. Based on the keywords you use in your content, ads are highly targeted and varies according to the page or post. The plugin is small and easy to use. All you need to input is your JomNiaga affiliate username and a tracking code to identify your blog as the traffic source. Then just use the default settings or configure your own to start showing related affiliate links and ads on each post you write.
